metadata.title: Pinterest is leaning hard into AI. The strategy appears to be backfiring | CNN Business
metadata.description: Abigail Wendling, 23, uses Pinterest to curate everything in her life, from recipes to wallpapers. At least until she saw a one-eyed cat when searching for a wallpaper. In another instance, a search for healthy recipes turned up a puzzling image showing a slice of cooked chicken with seasonings sprinkled inside it.
metadata.author: Ramishah Maruf
